title: Module Federation SSR Dev Server
description: Serve a SSR host application along with its known remotes.

browserTarget.description: Target which builds the browser application.

serverTarget.description: Target which builds the server application.

port.description: The port to be set on `process.env.PORT` for use in the server.

devRemotes.description: List of remote applications to run in development mode (i.e. using serve target).

skipRemotes.description: List of remote applications to not automatically serve, either statically or in development mode.
